user_device_rel: 1 person to 1 device; n devices to m devices
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
evaluation: Technical performance (speed); Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking)
contribution_desc: Introduces an inside out distance tracking technology based on acoustic signals on commodity devices. Used for tracking distances while interacting with the device in hand (gestures). Main contribution is robustness of the technique.
